fields.name: Description
fields.default: Land trusts across the country are saving land and harnessing the power of conservation to help make their communities stronger.

default.label: Land trust members
default.body: Land trusts are community-led and supported and protect lands and waters that benefit everyone.

default.label: Acres Protected
default.body: The Land Trust Alliance has set a bold goal for land trusts to conserve another 60 million acres by the end of the decade.

default.label: Years of Service
default.body: The Land Trust Alliance works passionately to support land trusts so they can secure more land now and for future generations.
